Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.


Home

About

Tags

Feed

APIs.json

    Schools Progress Report 2012-2013

    Schools Progress Report which focus on learning environment, student performance and progress.

    School Spending Since 1990

    Annual spending by and behalf of the Department of Education since 1990, adjusted for inflation

    School Districts

    GIS data: Boundaries of School Districts. All previously released versions of this data are available at BYTES of the BIG APPLE- Archive

    School District Breakdowns

    Demographic statistics broken down by school districts

    School Based Programs by Borough

    School based programs by borough with cost.

    School Based Programs by Borough

    School based programs by borough with cost.

    School Age Ridership

    Summary of documented students by OPT school code.
